White calzones with marinara sauce

Yield
Serves 4

How to Make It

1. Step
Soak chickpeas for 4 – 8hours (we just leave them overnight), rinse then place in a pot of water
2. Step
Bring to boil then simmer for 1 – 2 hours. Drain and set aside
3. Step
Peel and chop your garlic and veg
4. Step
Fry the onions and garlic in oil for 1min then add curry paste and curry powder and fry a further 2 mins
5. Step
Add can of coconut milk, stir then add sweet potato and chick peas. cook for 10 mins
6. Step
Add carrots and cook for 10 – 15 mins until all veg is cooked through
7. Step
Bring some water to the boil in a pot, rinse rice and add to boiling water and simmer for 15
8. Step
20 minutes until cooked
9. Step
Serve and enjoy

Ingredients

  • 2 – 4 cloves of garlic
  • 3 tbsp curry paste
  • 2 tsp Curry powder
  • 2 Onions
  • 2 sweet potatoes
  • 3 carrots
  • 300g Chick peas
  • 1 Can coconut milk
  • 400g Rice
